title: Turkey Sees Influx Of Refugees Fleeing ISIS
teaser: Thousands of terrified Kurds are fleeing ISIS and seeking refuge in Turkey. Some 100,000 people have moved across the border in the last two days. NPR's Arun Rath speaks to correspondent Deb Amos.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
